scripts.test:all: rm -f /tmp/test-errors.log /tmp/test-success.log; find test -name '*.ts' -print0 | xargs -0 -n 1 -P 4 sh -c 'mkdir -p /tmp/test-output-$(dirname $1) && npx hardhat test $1 > /tmp/test-output-$1.log 2>&1 && echo $1 >> /tmp/test-success.log || echo $1 >> /tmp/test-errors.log' sh; echo 'Tests completed. Successes: '; cat /tmp/test-success.log; echo 'Errors: '; cat /tmp/test-errors.log; echo 'Total tests run: $(cat /tmp/test-success.log /tmp/test-errors.log | wc -l)'
